job description:
A marketing startup based in NYC is hiring a Senor Software Engineer who has experience with either Java or Scala and big data tools. This hire would be joining the cloud team, the center of the software stack at the company.
  • 6+ years of professional software development experience
  • 2+ years of experience with Java or Scala
  • Experience with automated testing
  • Experience of CI/CD and Docker
  • Experience with Spark
  • Experience with AWS (EMR, CloudWatch, etc.)
  • Experience with data modeling and database design
  • DevOps experience
  • Familiartiy with Python as a scripting language
  • Architecting and building the software
  • Working with product managers to understand requirements and deliver them in an agile environment
  • Mentor junior developers
  • Competitive Salary: Up to $160k/year
    • You will receive the following benefits:
  • Health, Dental and Vision Insurance
  • Health Savings Account (HSA)
  • 401(k)
  • Team bonding events
  • Generous PTO
    • Applicants must be currently authorized to work in United States on a full-time basis now and in the future.

    This position does not offer sponsorship.

    Jobspring Partners, part of the Motion Recruitment network, provides IT Staffing Solutions (Contract, Contract-to-Hire, and Direct Hire) across 10 major North American markets. Our unique expertise in todays highest demand tech skill sets, paired with our deep networks and knowledge of our local technology markets, results in an exemplary track record with candidates and clients.
